DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the effect of the treatment with GrindcareÂ® on the muscles- and jaw symptoms and at the jaw muscle activity during sleep.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Period and Long-term Effect of Functional Electric Stimulation (FES) for Bruxism
DOC.criteria: Signed and dated ICF 18 years or older Fulfill the RDCcriteria for myofascial TMD diagnose (group 1a or 1b) Average pain more that 3 on a Visual Analog scale (VAS) in the baseline period Contraindication of concommitant diseases for the study judged by investigator Daily use of pain medication, e.g. prophylaxis against migraine or headache. Patients who are using occlusal splints in the treatment period.
